exception.name: ErrorUserNotAuthorized
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the user who has invoked a restricted SE API function is not authorized to execute this function.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorUserNotAuthorized that is thrown if the user who has invoked a restricted SE API function is not authorized to execute this function.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when authenticated user lacks required authorization for function
specification.applicability: All restricted API functions with role-based access control
